name: Romulus Capital
description: Romulus Capital is a seed-stage venture capital fund that focuses on investing in and building technology businesses. Founded in 2008, the firm remains hands-on and hungry, specializing in leading Seed and Series A rounds for B2B companies selling disruptive technology or deep technology companies spun out of top-tier research groups. Romulus Capital has partnerships with Artificial Intelligence centers at the University of Cambridge.
notable_investments: Romulus Capital has made notable investments in various startups, showcasing its commitment to early-stage ventures and innovative technologies.
investment_highlights: Romulus Capital recently closed a $75 million fund to support its investment activities, reflecting the firm's growth and continued focus on disruptive technologies.

name: Second Century Ventures
description: Second Century Ventures is the strategic investment arm of the National Association of REALTORS®, focusing on promoting innovation in the real estate industry and enabling entrepreneurial endeavors within the sector. They invest in ideas and ambitious teams looking to scale across real estate, financial, insurance, and home service verticals.
notable_investments: DocuSign, Notarize, BombBomb, Curbio, Obie, LulaFit, Occupier, Dealius
investment_highlights: Active role in global real estate technology sector, successful investments in innovative companies

name: NFP Corp
description: NFP Corp, operating through its website nfpvf.com, is a prominent insurance broker and consultant offering a range of services such as employee benefits, property and casualty, retirement, and individual private client solutions. NFP Ventures, a part of the company, focuses on investing in early-stage companies that align with NFP's core business objectives.
notable_investments: Aon plc acquisition of NFP Corp
investment_highlights: Successful acquisition by Aon plc

name: Oyster Ventures
description: Oyster Ventures is a venture capital firm that specializes in investing in exceptional new-frontier technologies. They focus on companies that bring liquidity and aim to innovate in the tech industry. With notable investments in companies like Eco and Fantuan, Oyster Ventures aims to support ventures with the potential for massive scalability and globalization.
address: 1355 Market St, San Francisco, California 94102, US
investment_highlights: Co-led the last round for Eco, invested in Fantuan, focused on new-frontier technologies

name: Threshold Ventures
description: Threshold Ventures, formerly known as Draper Fisher Jurvetson (DFJ), is a Silicon Valley-based venture capital firm that partners with visionary founders at early stages of explosive growth. Led by managing partners Emily Melton and Josh Stein, the firm has a strong focus on digital health investments, including disease treatment, nonclinical workflow, and value-based care. Notable investments by Threshold Ventures include Box, Livongo, Redfin, and Twilio.
investment_highlights: Successful exits, IPOs, notable growth metrics

name: Accomplice VC
description: Accomplice VC is a venture firm and contemporary family office founded by Jeff Fagnan and Ryan Moore. They are high conviction, concentrated, patient investors with a focus on making investments in companies such as AngelList, Carbon Black, Coinlist, Currencycloud, and DraftKings.
notable_investments: AngelList, Carbon Black, Coinlist, Currencycloud, DraftKings
investment_highlights: Accomplice last raised $205 million for a second fund in 2018 and has been actively involved in making strategic investments in various industry sectors.

name: K1 Investment Management
description: K1 Investment Management is a leading investment firm focusing on high-growth enterprise software companies globally. With a significant presence on LinkedIn and a commitment to supporting founders and executives within their portfolio, K1 Investment Management emphasizes building category leaders in the B2B SaaS sector through new investments and executive hires.
investment_highlights: K1 Investment Management has successfully deployed capital across 11 new investments, including Elmo in human capital management software, demonstrating their strategic focus on building category leaders.

name: Emigrant Capital
description: Emigrant Capital is a private investment firm that provides minority growth capital and majority recapitalization to companies in industries such as business services, consumer health & wellness, and industrial technology. They focus on companies with revenues ranging from $10 to $100 million and EBITDA between $2 to $15 million, offering long-term patient capital and working closely with management teams to develop strategies aligned with the companies' long-term goals.
address: 6 E 43rd St, New York, New York 10017, US
notable_investments: Fire Door Solutions, ShipSigma, Medterra, Emsar, East West Manufacturing, Primetime Healthcare Compliance Services
investment_highlights: Significant exits in 2019, multiple investments in various industries

name: Crescent Fund
description: Crescent Fund is a student-run venture capital fund based in Southern California, focusing on supporting and empowering student entrepreneurs. They have partnered with organizations like the Lloyd Greif Center for Entrepreneurial Studies - USC Marshall and have co-invested with prominent figures such as John Sculley and John Pleasants. Crescent Fund is dedicated to funding ventures with the potential to reach a valuation of $1 billion or more.
notable_investments: Rosewood Crescent hotel (now Hotel Crescent Court), Kona's $4M seed round, techweek techweek techweek, TikTok-style dating app, Crescent Grove Advisors

name: Rockefeller Brothers Fund

The Fund is highly selective in grant funding, with less than one percent of unsolicited grant applications resulting in funding. It deploys financial assets to support civil society partners in strengthening coalitions and fostering inclusivity.

name: Brownson, Rehmus & Foxworth
description: Brownson, Rehmus & Foxworth is a financial services firm based in Chicago, IL that provides investment advice and holistic financial planning services. The firm has a strong focus on serving multi-generational families and has built a reputation for being one of the largest independent wealth management organizations in the U.S. They offer personalized financial counseling, non-discretionary investment advisory services, and have billions in assets under management.

name: CMG Capital Management group, Inc.

The company offers a range of investment strategies to other RIAs, financial planners, and institutions, focusing on managing risk, mitigating volatility, and smoothing investment returns over time.
address: 10 Valley Stream Pkwy, Suite 202, Malvern, Pennsylvania 19355, US

name: Chatham Capital Group, Inc.
description: Chatham Capital Group, Inc. is a Wealth Management & Registered Investment Advisory Firm founded in 1996. The firm focuses on comprehensive financial planning and customized investment strategies to help families strengthen and improve their quality of life. Chatham Capital has provided flexible capital solutions to over 180 lower-middle market firms since 2001.
investment_highlights: Celebrating 25th year in business in 2021

name: CHRONICLE FAMILY OFFICES, LLC
description: CHRONICLE FAMILY OFFICES, LLC is a family office that provides personalized services to ultra-high-net-worth families, including investment management, financial planning, estate and tax planning, philanthropic investing, and concierge services. The firm was established in 2015 and focuses on strategic sectors such as real estate, private equity, and alternative asset classes. With a commitment to sustainable and technologically-driven solutions, CHRONICLE FAMILY OFFICES, LLC invests in digital and green technologies while emphasizing ESG considerations in its investment strategies.

name: Colony Family Offices
description: Colony Family Offices is an independent, multi-family office providing fully integrated wealth planning, investment management, and fiduciary services to individuals and families of wealth. Established in 2013, Colony represents over 30 multi-generational families across the U.S. with assets under management exceeding $2.35 billion. The firm's team focuses on fiduciary responsibility and expertise in accounting, tax, legal, and investments.

name: CIG Private Wealth Management

name: Esko Asset Management
description: Esko Asset Management is a global provider of integrated software and hardware solutions that accelerate the go-to-market process of packaged goods. Esko solutions are used in packaging management, asset management, artwork creation, structural design, prepress, 3D visualization, flexo plate making, and workflow management. Esko employs about 1,500 people worldwide and is focused on supporting and managing packaging design and print processes for various industry stakeholders. The company has subsidiaries such as Enfocus and MediaBeacon, which offer automation solutions, PDF quality control tools, and digital asset management solutions. Additionally, Esko recently acquired MediaBeacon Inc., a leader in Digital Asset Management (DAM) software solutions.

name: Family Wealth Dynamics
description: Family Wealth Dynamics focuses on the complex interplay between wealth and family relationships. Family wealth can intensify negative family dynamics, leading to conflicts rooted in emotional histories. Successful family wealth management requires understanding each family's unique values, goals, and aspirations to align investment strategies with their shared vision.
notable_investments: Notable investments by Family Wealth Dynamics are focused on inter-generational wealth transfer, estate planning, and risk management strategies.
investment_highlights: Family Wealth Dynamics has successfully helped families align their wealth management strategies with their unique values and goals, ensuring long-term wealth preservation and growth.

name: Galapagos Partners L.P.
